title: Will vs. Technology
description: Where I, William Rudenmalm, document my quixotic struggle against technology.

feed.subtitle: Where I, William Rudenmalm, document my quixotic struggle against technology.

aboutAuthor: is a european technologist passionate about the next big thing and the people building it. William is particularly interested in scaling engineering organizations and navigating trade offs of architecture and velocity. In the field of computer science, his expertise lies in distributed systems, scalability and machine learning. Among the technologies William is particularly excited about are Kubernetes, Rust, nats, Kafka and neo4j.
